vote.title: Authorize a second amendment to the loan agreement with East Dallas Community Organization for the development of ten single-family homes for the Scattered Sites Project to: (1) reduce the HOME  Investment  Partnerships  Program  (HOME) loan  amount  from  $652,188.00 to $424,677.44, the new total loan amount is $424,677.44; (2) reduce the number of HOME-funded single-family homes from nine to six; and (3) reduce the Neighborhood Stabilization Program amount from $55,020.00 to $47,520.00, the new total amount is $47,520.00 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
